title: 55: So I F*cked Up My Last Interview. Let’s talk.
description:
TW: Eating disorder thoughts and behaviors
FINALLY back in Utah, Sofia gets real this week. LA took a lot out of the Sloot Media team, but we’re back and thriving. For some exciting news, Sofia squirted for the first time in 5 years! A coveted feat that we should all aspire to reach. Next, we get REAL about eating habits, disorders, and some shit that just really needs to be discussed. Life is real, let’s take care of each other Sloots, this is a safe space for ALL. Let’s talk about it, even if it’s uncomfortable. 
Follow Sofia on Instagram and Twitter @SofiaFranklyn
Find merch HERE: https://sofiafranklyn.com/ 
Episode promo codes:
Dipsea: http://dipseastories.com/SOFIA for 30 days FREE access 
MVMT : http://MVMT.com/SOFIA for FREE SHIPPING and FREE RETURNS
Download Switchcraft for free and unlock the magical mystery 
Glamnetic: http://glamnectic.com/SOFIA and enter promo code SOFIA at checkout for 30% off!
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy

TW: Eating disorder thoughts and behaviors

FINALLY back in Utah, Sofia gets real this week. LA took a lot out of the Sloot Media team, but we’re back and thriving. For some exciting news, Sofia squirted for the first time in 5 years! A coveted feat that we should all aspire to reach. Next, we get REAL about eating habits, disorders, and some shit that just really needs to be discussed.
